list.name: Online
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  "onlineTime" as "time",
  "offlineTime" as "timeend",
  CASE WHEN "onlineTime"="offlineTime" THEN 'Car sent update'
            ELSE 'Car went online (' || ("offlineTime"-"onlineTime") || ')'
  END AS "text"
FROM
  onlinestates
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN' and
  ($__timeFilter("onlineTime") OR $__timeFilter("offlineTime"))

list.name: Climatization
list.rawQuery:
SELECT "time",
       "timeend",
       'Climatization on ('
              || ("timeend"-"time")
              || ')' AS "text"
FROM   (
                SELECT   *,
                         "carCapturedTimestamp"                                           AS "time",
                         Lag("climatisationState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeClimatisationState",
                         (
                                  SELECT   "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "timeend"
                                  FROM     climatization          AS climatization2
                                  WHERE    climatization2."climatisationState" = 'OFF'
                                  AND      climatization.vehicle_vin = climatization2.vehicle_vin
                                  AND      climatization."carCapturedTimestamp" < climatization2."carCapturedTimestamp"
                                  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" limit 1) "timeend"
                FROM     climatization
                WHERE    vehicle_vin = '$VIN') AS data
WHERE  "climatisationState" != 'OFF'
AND ("timeend"-"time") < INTERVAL '1 hour'
AND    "beforeClimatisationState" = 'OFF'
AND ($__timeFilter("time") OR $__timeFilter("timeend"))

list.name: Charging
list.rawQuery:
SELECT "time",
       "timeend",
       'Charging ('
              || ("timeend"-"time")
              || ')' AS "text"
FROM   (
                SELECT   *,
                         "carCapturedTimestamp"                                           AS "time",
                         Lag("chargingState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeChargingState",
                         (
                                  SELECT   "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "timeend"
                                  FROM     charges          AS charges2
                                  WHERE    charges2."chargingState" != 'CHARGING'
                                  AND      charges.vehicle_vin = charges2.vehicle_vin
                                  AND      charges."carCapturedTimestamp" < charges2."carCapturedTimestamp"
                                  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" limit 1) "timeend"
                FROM     charges
                WHERE    vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
                ) AS data
WHERE  "chargingState" = 'CHARGING'
AND ("timeend"-"time") < INTERVAL '1 day'
AND    "beforeChargingState" != 'CHARGING'
AND ($__timeFilter("time") OR $__timeFilter("timeend"))

panels.description: Current status of the car ${VIN:text} with VIN ${VIN:raw}. To receive reasonable results you have to make settings for your car.
panels.title: $VIN

panels.description: Current state of charge in percent

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "currentSOC_pct" AS "Battery SoC"
FROM battery
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Battery (now)

panels.description:
Battery level and projected range plotted over time.
Some cars only update these values during startup and shutdown.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "currentSOC_pct" AS "Battery SoC"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "cruisingRangeElectric_km" AS "Electric Range"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Battery Level

panels.description: Indicates if the car is currently awake (online) or sleeping.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "lastUpdate" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "online"=True THEN 1
       WHEN "online"=False THEN 0
  END as "online"
FROM vehicles
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'

panels.title: Car Online State

panels.description: Time when the last successful connection to the servers were made and time when the last information from the car was received.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "lastUpdate" AS "Last update from Server",
  "lastChange" AS "Last update from Car"
FROM vehicles
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'

panels.title: Last Data from Car

panels.description: Current range calculated from current consumption

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END AS "Electric Range"
FROM vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "cruisingRangeElectric_km" AS "Electric Range"
FROM battery
WHERE
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

panels.title: Projected Electric Range (now)

panels.description: Time remaining until climatization is turned off automatically.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  MAX("remainingClimatisationTime_min")
FROM climatization
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "climatisationState" != 'OFF' THEN "remainingClimatisationTime_min"
  ELSE 0 END
FROM climatization
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

panels.title: Remaining Climatization Time (now)

panels.description:
Battery level and projected range plotted over time for primary and secondary engine. This is useful especially for hybrids.
Some cars only update these values during startup and shutdown.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_currentSOC_pct" AS "Primary Engine SoC"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "totalRange_km" AS "Total Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_remainingRange_km" AS "Primary Engine Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "secondary_currentSOC_pct" AS "Secondary Engine SoC"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "secondary_remainingRange_km" AS "Secondary Engine Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Levels & Range

panels.description: Shows information for the usage of VWsFriend

options.html:
Warnings:

News:

Recent Events:

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '${VIN}'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  logtime,
  log FROM
(
  (SELECT
    started AS logtime,
    'charging started' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE started IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY started DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    connected AS logtime,
    'charger connected' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE connected IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY connected DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    locked AS logtime,
    'connector locked' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE locked IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY locked DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
    (SELECT
    ended AS logtime,
    'charging ended' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE ended IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY ended DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    disconnected AS logtime,
    'charger disconnected' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE disconnected IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY disconnected DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    unlocked AS logtime,
    'connector unlocked' AS log
  FROM charging_sessions
  WHERE unlocked IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY unlocked DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    date AS logtime,
    'car was refueled' AS log
  FROM refuel_sessions
  WHERE date IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 3)
   UNION
  (SELECT
    "startDate" AS logtime,
    'trip started' AS log
  FROM trips
  WHERE "startDate" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "startDate" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    "endDate" AS logtime,
    'trip ended' AS log
  FROM trips
  WHERE "endDate" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "endDate" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS logtime,
  CASE WHEN "climatisationState"= 'OFF' THEN 'climatisation stopped'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'HEATING' THEN 'climatisation heating'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'COOLING' THEN 'climatisation cooling'
       WHEN "climatisationState"= 'VENTILATION' THEN 'climatisation ventilating'
       ELSE 'unkown'
  END AS log
FROM
  (SELECT
        "carCapturedTimestamp",
        "climatisationState",
        LAG("climatisationState") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "beforeClimatisationState",
        'climatisation started' AS log
      FROM climatization
      WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" IS NOT NULL AND "climatisationState" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
        AND "climatisationState" IN ('OFF', 'HEATING', 'COOLING', 'VENTILATION')
      ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC
    ) AS climatization
  WHERE "climatisationState" != "beforeClimatisationState"
  ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC
  LIMIT 10)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    start AS logtime,
    'New warning: '||text AS log
  FROM warning_lights
  WHERE start IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY start DESC
  LIMIT 3)
  UNION
  (SELECT
    "end" AS logtime,
    'Warning gone: '||text AS log
  FROM warning_lights
  WHERE "end" IS NOT NULL AND vehicle_vin = '${VIN}'
  ORDER BY "end" DESC
  LIMIT 3)
) AS logs
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  COUNT(*)>2 AS has_error
FROM weconnect_errors
WHERE datetime > (NOW() - INTERVAL '30 MINUTES')

panels.title: Information

panels.description: If the car is charging, current charging power. This value is not available on all cars.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargePower_kW"
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Charging Power (now)

panels.description: Time remaining until desired state of charge is reached.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  to_timestamp(0) AS "time",
  MAX("remainingChargingTimeToComplete_min")
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "remainingChargingTimeToComplete_min"
FROM charges
WHERE
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1)

panels.title: Remaining Charging Time (now)

panels.description:
Current consumption and Range if the car would be at 100% SoC. Consumption is calculated as capacity divided by current range. The green area shows the WLTP range.
Some cars only update these values during startup and shutdown. Value is only useful for electric cars or hybrids running on electricity only.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("carCapturedTimestamp"),
  CASE WHEN "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC > 0 THEN "cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC END AS "Current Range at 100%",
  CASE WHEN "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC = 0 OR "cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE
       CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
       ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC END / ("cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC) * 100::NUMERIC END AS "Calculated consumption"
FROM
  battery
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  unnest(ARRAY[to_timestamp(${__from}/1000), to_timestamp(${__to}/1000)]) AS time,
  CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END AS "WLTP"
FROM
  vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Consumption & Range extrapolated to 100% SoC

panels.description:
Current efficiency. 100% means that with the current consumption the WLTP range is reached.
Some cars only update these values during startup and shutdown. Value is only useful for electric cars or hybrids running on electricity only.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time("carCapturedTimestamp"),
  CASE WHEN "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC > 0 THEN
    ("cruisingRangeElectric_km"::NUMERIC / "currentSOC_pct"::NUMERIC * 100::NUMERIC) / 
      CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC
           ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_wltp_range"::NUMERIC END * 100::NUMERIC
  ELSE NULL END AS "Efficiency"
FROM
  battery
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  unnest(ARRAY[to_timestamp(${__from}/1000), to_timestamp(${__to}/1000)]) AS time,
  100 AS "100% = WLTP Range"
FROM
  vehicles
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  vehicles.vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Efficiency

panels.description: Charging power and charging rate in kilometers over time.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargePower_kW" AS "Charge Power",
  "chargeRate_kmph" AS "Charge Rate"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")
UNION ALL
(SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  CASE WHEN "chargingState" = 'CHARGING' THEN "delta"::decimal*( CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
  ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC END::decimal/100::decimal) / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM "timedelta") / 3600)
  ELSE NULL END AS "Charge Power",
  CASE WHEN "chargingState" = 'CHARGING' THEN "deltakm"::decimal / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM "timedelta") / 3600)
  ELSE NULL END AS "Charge Rate"
FROM
  (SELECT *,
  DATE_TRUNC('minute', "carCapturedTimestamp") AS "batteryTime",
  ("carCapturedTimestamp" - LAG("carCapturedTimestamp") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "timedelta",
  ("currentSOC_pct" - LAG("currentSOC_pct") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "delta",
  ("cruisingRangeElectric_km" - LAG("cruisingRangeElectric_km") OVER (ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")) AS "deltakm"
FROM
  battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp") AS delta
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
"chargingState",
DATE_TRUNC('minute', charges."carCapturedTimestamp") AS "chargeTime"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN') as charging ON "chargeTime" = "batteryTime"
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON delta.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON delta.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  "delta" > 0 AND
  NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM charges WHERE "chargePower_kW" IS NOT NULL AND "chargeRate_kmph" IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND vehicle_vin = '$VIN' LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY "carCapturedTimestamp")

SELECT
    "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
    ((("temperatureHvBatteryMin_K" + "temperatureHvBatteryMax_K")/2) - 273.15) AS "Battery Temperature"
FROM
    battery_temperature
WHERE
    $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
    vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY
    "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC

panels.title: Charging

panels.description: Highlights the times when the car is online, heating and charging.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  "onlineTime" AS "time",
  'online' AS "Online"
FROM onlinestates
WHERE
  ("onlineTime" != "offlineTime" OR "offlineTime" IS NULL) AND
  $__timeFilter("onlineTime") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION ALL
(SELECT
  "offlineTime" AS "time",
  'offline' AS "state"
FROM onlinestates
WHERE
  ("onlineTime" != "offlineTime" OR "onlineTime" IS NULL) AND
  $__timeFilter("offlineTime") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "climatisationState" AS "Climatization"
FROM climatization
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargingState" AS "Charging"
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: States

list.definition: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC
list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN
list.query: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC
